sentence.Network_en: Michael made us all laugh with his zany tricks.
sentence.Network_cn: 迈克尔玩儿弄各种可笑的把戏把我们都逗笑了.

sentence.Network_en: She made us all laugh with her zany tricks.
sentence.Network_cn: 她那些滑稽的恶作剧逗得我们都大笑起来.

sentence.Network_en: He tried lecturing in California again with great success in the style of zany inconsequence.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在加州讲演,又非常成功,用的噱头也是模仿丑角的滑稽.

list.abs: Be zany 做个有趣的人从第二行开始,就是我们要敢于做的事情,我突然发现现在的孩子,确实在这些方面做的不够好,包括我在内.虽然,以前我一直自认为我做的很.
现在的目光,未来的理想,它们总能在生命的一个拐角相遇……...  Z zany 滑稽可笑的   21世纪是一个需要愉悦自我更需要愉悦大众的世纪,当耗资六亿、历时五年被称作.
This creates very spontaneous and zany looking animation and is used for wild , scrambling action ., 这就很自发故事看动画和用于野生乱行动.

since 1937 he had ridden herd on a zany cast of cartoonists of whom he understood little , having , unfortunately for a cartoon producer , no sense of humor to call upon .自1937年以来，他充满了畜群的滑稽演员漫画家，其中他的理解太少，而不幸的是一个卡通制作，没有幽默感呼吁。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French zani or Italian zan(n)i, Venetian form of Gianni, Giovanni 'John', stock name of the servants acting as clowns in the commedia dell'arte

encyclopedia.content: 形容词：滑稽的 滑稽，古指谓能言善辩，言辞流利，现在一般都指言语、动作或事态令人发笑。 名词：小丑注音 小丑 xiǎochǒu [1]小丑 越剧行当之一。 小丑又叫小花脸，因为所表演的人物往往在鼻子上勾画一块小白粉，便具有风趣、诙谐、幽默、滑稽或者阴险、狡猾。 分类：分长衫小丑、短衫小丑、彩旦几类。 长衫小丑是指穿长衫的丑行，例如《王老虎抢亲》中的王天豹，《沉香扇》中的蔡德清。 短衫小丑是指穿短衫、系作的店家、酒保

entry.def: Zany humour or a zany person is strange or eccentric in an amusing way.

example.ex: ...the zany humour of the Marx Brothers.
example.tran: 马克思兄弟的另类幽默

means.word_mean: 1. a buffoon in one of the old comedies; imitates others for ludicrous effect
2. a man who is a stupid incompetent fool

sentences.sentence: "gave me a cockamamie reason for not going"
"some wacky plan for selling more books"

auth_sentence.content: Herm Edwards expects to see all sorts of zany things this weekend because preseason openers are always a circus.
